Text: Oh I see it goes into packages folder. I have other sims 3 store updates in this folder. Should i delete them to add this fix or leave them there? (They fix my blackjack table so i am trying not to delete them)

@cake3434
This one is to replace the one you have.

It will fix not only what is mentioned but it will also fix everything else that requires fixes.

Because of that the old fix file you have is no longer required.
